Key: Just let me. Jeez, pull yourself together.

(Whoa. H-Her face is so close... I never
thought about this, but seeing Kotori up
close, she's maturing so much...)
Translation:
(Guau. S-Su cara está tan cerca... Nunca
pensé en esto, pero viendo a Kotori de
cerca, está madurando tanto...)

Key:
I bet you anything that something stupid
crossed your mind.
Translation:
Te apuesto lo que quieras a que algo
estúpido se te pasó por la cabeza.

Key:
No need to thank me. If you're not dressed
right, you'll embarrass me.
Translation:
No hace falta que me des las gracias. Si
no vas bien vestido, me avergonzarás.

Key:
(What? Kotori's acting kinda weird.
Is it me... or is she blushing?)
Translation:
(¿Qué? Kotori está actuando un poco raro.
¿Soy yo... o se está sonrojando?)

Key:
(It sorta feels like she doesn't remember
interactions we've had from one day to
the next.)
Translation:
(Es como si no recordara las
interacciones que hemos
tenidode un día para otro).

Key: Well, you have a nice day.
